# These structures are those generated by the "extract_model0.sh" script in each "pyinteraph" folder inside each system's folder.
# For example, the reference structure for the system "bclxl_puma_3.5nm" is "bclxl_puma_3.5nm/pyinteraph/model0.pdb".
# They correspond to the first frame of each trajectory.

cp ../free_2nm_tips3p/pyinteraph/model0.pdb ./free_2nm_tip3p.pdb
cp ../free_cap_tip3p/pyinteraph/model0.pdb ./free_cap_tip3p.pdb
cp ../free_2nm_tip3p/pyinteraph/model0.pdb ./free_2nm_tips3p.pdb
cp ../bclxl_puma_3.5nm/pyinteraph/model0.pdb ./bclxl_puma_3.5nm.pdb
cp ../bclxl_puma_capped/pyinteraph/model0.pdb ./bclxl_puma_capped.pdb

# *_processed.pdb structures have been either renumbered or chainized or both, and are the ones used for the analyses.
# process_*.sh scripts are those that have been run to perform the processing.

# Summary of the processing:
# - free_tip3p_2nm.pdb -> chain A assigned to all atoms -> free_tip3p_2nm_processed.pdb 
# - free_tip3p_cap.pdb -> chain A assigned to all atoms -> free_tip3p_cap_processed.pdb
# - free_tips3p_2nm.pdb -> chain A assigned to all atoms -> free_tips3p_2nm_processed.pdb
# - bclxl_puma_3.5nm.pdb -> chain B renumbered 130-154 according to the UniProt numbering of PUMA (Q9BXH1) -> bclxl_puma_3.5nm_processed.pdb
# - bclxl_puma_capped.pdb -> chaib B renumbered 130-154  according to the UniProt numbering of PUMA (Q9BXH1) -> bclxl_puma_capped_processed.pdb

sh process_free_tip3p_2nm.sh
sh process_free_tip3p_cap.sh
sh process_free_tips3p_2nm.sh
sh process_bclxl_puma_3.5nm.sh
sh process_bclxl_puma_capped.sh

# These reference structures are used for:
# * psntools_analyses
